tests.name: TestProject2
tests.input:
C      is quirky,   flawed,    and  an enormous     success.
       Although accidents of     history  surely  helped,
    it evidently      satisfied    a    need    for  a   system  implementation       language
efficient    enough    to  displace            assembly   language,
      yet sufficiently   abstract   and fluent        to describe     algorithms   and
interactions    in a      wide    variety   of   environments.
                       --       Dennis     M.          Ritchie
tests.output:
